welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lincolnwood! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, delicious food, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that Lincolnwood has to offer â€“ enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at O'hare International Airport, serving domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Home to American Airlines and its regional partners, with flights to domestic and select international destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serving a mix of domestic and international flights for various airlines, including Delta and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The international terminal at O'hare International Airport, serving a variety of international airlines and destinations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport. Connect to the 'ORD Free WiFi' network and accept the terms and conditions to access.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
